description:
Toriko and Komatsu follow the giant Fortune Roll, eating along the way towards the next training ingredient found somewhere in the Lost Forest... Bubble Fruit! But somehow they encounter a restaurant that vanishes at will and food that`s more difficult to eat than anything they`ve had before!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gasshou Ichirei! Bishoku Ningen Kokuhou Chin Chinchin Toujou!!
Put Your Hands Together and Bow! Gourmet National Treasure, Chin Chin-Chin, Appears!
合掌一礼! 美食人間国宝・珍鎮々登場!!
